response.overview: When a train carrying atomic warheads mysteriously crashes in the former Soviet Union, a nuclear specialist discovers the accident is really part of a plot to cover up the theft of the weapons. Assigned to help her recover the missing bombs is a crack Special Forces Colonel.
response.tagline: In the fall of 1997, every nuclear device in the world will be accounted for...except one.
response.title: The Peacemaker

titles.title: 和平制造者 / 战略杀手 / 和平缔造者 / 末日戒备

keywords.name: based on magazine, newspaper or article
